name: Forest the People
description:
Created for Molyjam 2013 -- also known as the What Would Molydeux 48 hour game jam. The theme of 2013's jam was to base a game idea off of a select quote from famed game designer and wishful thinker, Peter Molyneux. This particular jam was my first successful attempt to create a competently functional game in such a short time period. The game itself is a simple puzzle game, wherein the player must uncover the randomly selected People piece by clicking away all the others.

“If you could imagine, there was this hill completely full of people, like a forest of people. It was quite scary, actually.”

— Peter Molyneux
